means: 花费少，少花掉( underspend的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The inquiry found that the company had seriously underspent on safety equipment.
sentence.Network_cn: 调查发现，公司对安全设备的投资严重不足。

entry.tran: 支出不足；花费少于预算；花费低于支付能力
entry.def: If an organization or country underspends, it spends less money than it plans to or less money than it can afford.

example.ex: ...a country that underspends on health and overspends on statisticians.
example.tran: 一个在公共卫生方面支出不足而在统计人员方面支出过高的国家

means.word_mean: 1. not spending at the normal rate
